name: UpsertOrdersInHubspot
description:
Create or update orders in HubSpot CRM.

This tool calls the HubSpot CRM API to create or update multiple order records based on a unique property value. Use it when you need to batch insert or update orders by specifying a unique identifier for each order.

parameters.name: orders_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object containing an array of orders, each with unique identifiers and properties for upsert operation.

idProperty.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

objectWriteTraceId.description: An identifier for tracing the creation request.

id.description: The unique ID of the object.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

idProperty.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

objectWriteTraceId.description: An identifier for tracing the creation request.

id.description: The unique ID of the object.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
